solution_line_template: Ellen takes {num_balls}*{rise_time_per_ball}=<<{num_balls}*{rise_time_per_ball}={total_rise_time}>>{total_rise_time} hours in total to rise all balls of dough.
It will take {num_balls}*{bake_time_per_ball}=<<{num_balls}*{bake_time_per_ball}={total_bake_time}>>{total_bake_time} more hours to bake each one.
It will take her {total_rise_time}+{total_bake_time}=<<{total_rise_time}+{total_bake_time}={total_time}>>{total_time} hours to make all of the bread.
